channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FELIX-2143] NPE in background search
item.description:

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: caused by missing framework bundle - tidied up immediate problem by logging error message vs throwing npe
Mark issues raised by me as closed
